content: this pattern is directions and tutorial it uses magic_ring single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc slip_stitch and is crocheted in the round materials -pink worsted weight sport weight or aran weight yarn -rat colored white brown gray cream black worsted weight sport weight or aran weight yarn -white cream or silver yarn for optional wings -g h or size 7 4 5 mm hook its your preference
